00320 class ILastTStreamIPMPControlInfoPart: public ITStreamIPMPControlInfoPart {
00321 public:
00322   virtual ~ILastTStreamIPMPControlInfoPart() {};
00323 
00334   virtual ISigCertContainer* GetSigCertContainer() const = 0;
00335 
00347   virtual bool CreateSigCertContainer(ISigCertContainer** container) = 0;
00348 
00358   virtual bool MPEG2Encode(ByteSeq& encoded) const {
00359     encoded = ByteSeq();
00360     encoded += GetTableID();
00361     ByteT tmp = (GetSectionSyntaxIndicator() == true)? (0x80): (0x0);
00362     UInt16T sectionLength = 12 + GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength();
00363     ByteSeq sigEnc;
00364     if (GetSigCertContainer() != 0) {
00365       if (GetSigCertContainer()->MPEG2Encode(sigEnc) == false) {
00366         return false;
00367       }
00368       sectionLength += (UInt16T)(sigEnc.GetLength());
00369     }
00370     if ((sectionLength & 0xf000) != 0) {
00371       //  Invalid section length (greater or equal 1 << 12).
00372       return false;
00373     }
00374     sectionLength |= (tmp << 8);
00375     encoded += ByteSeq(sectionLength);
00376     tmp = (ByteT)(GetIPMPControlInfoVersion() << 1);
00377     tmp |= (GetCurrentNextIndicator() == true)? (1): (0);
00378     encoded += tmp;
00379     encoded += GetPartNumber();
00380     encoded += GetPartNumber();
00381     encoded += ByteSeq(GetTotalControlInfoClassesLen());
00382     if (GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength() >= (1 << 16)) {
00383       return false;
00384     }
00385     encoded += ByteSeq((UInt16T)(GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength()));
00386     encoded += GetIPMPControlInfos();
00387     if (GetSigCertContainer() != 0) {
00388       encoded += 0x80;
00389       encoded += sigEnc;
00390     } else {
00391       encoded += 0x0;
00392     }
00393     return true;
00394   }
00395 };

00435     encoded = ByteSeq(GetTableID());
00436     ByteT tmp = (GetSectionSyntaxIndicator() == true)? (0x80): (0x0);
00437     UInt16T sectionLength = 11 + GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength();
00438     if ((sectionLength & 0xf000) != 0) {
00439       //  Invalid section length (greater or equal 1 << 12).
00440       return false;
00441     }
00442     sectionLength |= (tmp << 8);
00443     encoded += ByteSeq(sectionLength);
00444     tmp = (ByteT)(GetIPMPControlInfoVersion() << 1);
00445     tmp |= (GetCurrentNextIndicator() == true)? (1): (0);
00446     encoded += tmp;

00448     encoded += GetLastPartNumber();

00450     if (GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength() >= (1 << 16)) {

00505   virtual bool MPEG2Encode(ByteSeq& encoded) const {
00506     encoded = ByteSeq(GetPacketStartCodePrefix());
00507     encoded += GetStreamID();
00508     UInt16T sectionLength = 16 + GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength();
00509     ByteSeq sigEnc;
00510     if (GetSigCertContainer() != 0) {
00511       if (GetSigCertContainer()->MPEG2Encode(sigEnc) == false) {
00512         return false;
00513       }
00514       sectionLength += (UInt16T)(sigEnc.GetLength());
00515     }
00516     if ((sectionLength & 0xf000) != 0) {
00517       //  Invalid section length (greater or equal 1 << 12).
00518       return false;
00519     }
00520     encoded += ByteSeq(sectionLength);
00521     UInt16T tmp16 = 0x8100;
00522     tmp16 |= (GetPESExtensionFlag() == true)? (1): (0);
00523     encoded += ByteSeq(tmp16);
00524     encoded += 0x03;
00525     encoded += (ByteT)((GetPESExtensionFlag2() == true)? (1): (0));
00526     encoded += 0x81;
00527     ByteT tmp8 = (GetStreamIDExtensionFlag() == true)? (0x80): (0);
00528     tmp8 |= GetStreamIDExtension();
00529     encoded += tmp8;
00530     tmp8 = GetIPMPControlInfoVersion() << 3;
00531     tmp8 |= (GetCurrentNextIndicator() == true)? (0x4): (0);
00532     encoded += tmp8;
00533     encoded += GetPartNumber();
00534     encoded += GetPartNumber();
00535     if (GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength() >= (1 << 16)) {
00536       return false;
00537     }
00538     encoded += ByteSeq((UInt16T)(GetIPMPControlInfos().GetLength()));
00539     encoded += GetIPMPControlInfos();
00540     if (GetSigCertContainer() != 0) {
00541       encoded += 0x80;
00542       encoded += sigEnc;
00543     } else {
00544       encoded += 0x0;
00545     }
00546     return true;
00547   }

00592       //  Invalid section length (greater or equal 1 << 12).
00593       return false;
00594     }
00595     encoded += ByteSeq(sectionLength);
00596     UInt16T tmp16 = 0x8100;
00597     tmp16 |= (GetPESExtensionFlag() == true)? (1): (0);
00598     encoded += ByteSeq(tmp16);
00599     encoded += 0x03;
00600     encoded += (ByteT)((GetPESExtensionFlag2() == true)? (1): (0));
00601     encoded += 0x81;
00602     ByteT tmp8 = (GetStreamIDExtensionFlag() == true)? (0x80): (0);
00603     tmp8 |= GetStreamIDExtension();
00604     encoded += tmp8;
